translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

I inform Your Excellency, Ensign Ferreira of the 5th Corps of National Guards, that the anarchists recently captured near the Chapel are: Cândido Machado de Sousa, Sebastião Gomes, Francisco Machado, João Rodrigues, Inácio Furtado, Manuel José dos Santos, Feliciano Francisco, lieutenant of the rebels, and Francisco José do Nascimento Júnior; the latter was released and handed over to Dr. Fagundes by an order from Your Excellency.

God keep Your Excellency.  
Barracks in the Prisons of the 11th Battalion, November 26, 1840.  
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Tomás José da Silva.  
Marshal Commander of the Garrison.  
Antônio Pedro de Abreu  
Lieutenant Commander of the Prisons of the 11th Battalion.
